nodes.text: The Dymek concussion missile was a type of concussion missile armament installed in the Millennium Falcon by Han Solo.

The missiles were wedge-shaped, with a streamlined concussion chamber. It also possessed an armor-piercing warhead at the tip. Its optimum range was 260 meters, while its maximum range was 750 meters.

Han Solo had modified each of the Millennium Falcon's Arakyd concussion missile launchers to accommodate four Dymek concussion missiles, among other concussion missile launcher ammo from various manufacturers.
